issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Start Studio
Open Preferences > Studio > Themes (I chose Cobalt)
Select a theme, apply, close Preferences
Restart Studio


h3. Actual Result
Default theme, not selected theme, loads.

h3. Expected Result
Selected theme loads
fields.summary: Studio 3.2 overwrites theme selection on restart

comments.body:
I follow the same steps as you have mentioned but not able to reproduce the error. My studio built is 3.2.0 GA.

Prefreneces  ==> Studio ==>  Overall theme  ==> editor theme ==> cobalt

Apply and restart the studio and I see the cobalt theme.

Please let me know what am I missing.

Ritu,
I have no idea what to tell you. I just recreated the issue again. Dark Studio/Cobalt. Close/Restart. Overall theme reverts to Mac, Editor theme reverts to Eclipse. So, I tried a third time with Django. Close/Restart. This time the correct theme reloaded. Switched back to Cobalt. Close/Restart. Cobalt still displays. This is driving me crazy.

It's just one of quite a few problems I'm having with release 3.2 right now. And they are costing me greatly in lost productivity and sanity.

It appears that you are able to set the theme correctly now. Let us know if you run into this issue again and we would try to diagnose this issue further as we have not been able to reproduce this issue on multiple machines.

Please file JIRA tickets for other issues you are running into and we would take a look at them at a priority. Please note that we are going to release 3.2.1 shortly that would fix most of the issues with 3.2.0 release.
